## Bcp47.Match.matchQuality variable

Common levels of match quality for a single language match.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
matchQuality: {
    exact: number;
    variant: number;
    region: number;
    macroRegion: number;
    neutralRegion: number;
    affinity: number;
    preferredRegion: number;
    sibling: number;
    undetermined: number;
    none: number;
}
```
